meanings.definition: A machine used for separating particles based on their density by spinning them at high speeds.
meanings.sent1: The ultracentrifuge separated the tiny particles by spinning them quickly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used the ultracentrifuge to separate different materials based on their weight.
meanings.sent3: The ultracentrifuge decided to take a spin and separate the particles for fun.
meanings.sent4: The ultracentrifuge was like a magical whirlwind, sorting the particles effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The ultracentrifuge roared to life, creating a whirlpool of separation.

meanings.definition: To separate particles based on their density using a machine called an ultracentrifuge.
meanings.sent1: They decided to ultracentrifuge the mixture to see the different layers.
meanings.sent2: She carefully ultracentrifuged the solution to analyze its components.
meanings.sent3: The chef wanted to ultracentrifuge the ingredients to make the perfect dish.
meanings.sent4: He ultracentrifuged his thoughts, trying to separate the facts from the fiction.
meanings.sent5: The detective ultracentrifuged the evidence to uncover the truth.
